SEARCH
Package io.github.jspinak.brobot.actions.methods.basicactions.find.color.profiles

Class ColorSchema

java.lang.Object
io.github.jspinak.brobot.actions.methods.basicactions.find.color.profiles.ColorSchema
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColorSchemaBGR, ColorSchemaHSV
public class ColorSchema extends Object
A ColorSchema is a representation of a color cluster. Currently, there are two formats used: HSV and BGR, of which the ColorSchema should have only one. A ColorSchema has a set of ColorInfos, one for each ColorValue, such as Hue, Saturation, or Value. ColorInfos contain statistics about the color cluster, such as min, max, mean, and stddev.

    • getMat

      public org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Mat getMat(ColorInfo.ColorStat colorStat, org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Size size)
      Creates a Mat of the colorStat for all ColorValues in this Schema. For example, when colorStat = MIN and the Schema is an HSV Schema, this method will return a 3d Mat with {min Hue, min Sat, min Val} across channels. All cells in the same channel with have the same value.
      Returns:
      a Mat with the selected colorStat for all ColorValues in the Schema.

    • getColorStats

      public double[] getColorStats(ColorInfo.ColorStat colorStat)

    • getColorStatProfile

      public ColorStatProfile getColorStatProfile(ColorInfo.ColorStat colorStat)
      Returns a ColorStatProfile for a given ColorStat. For example, when colorStat = MIN and the Schema is an HSV Schema, this method will return a ColorStatProfile with {HUE: min Hue, SATURATION: min Sat, VALUE: min Val}.
      Parameters:
      colorStat - the ColorStat to get the values for.
      Returns:
      a ColorStatProfile of ColorValues for a given ColorStat.
